issue.title: Gazebo never starts when loading models from database takes longer than 30 secs

content.raw:
I can reproduce it. Probably introduced in pull request #577.

As a workarounds while the fix is ready:

1. Launch gazebo several times (depending on your network bandwidth) should end up with a full database ready.
1. Modify sources, remove the timeout clause introduced in the while at [ConnectionManager.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/577/fix-gzlog-hang/diff#Lgazebo/transport/ConnectionManager.ccT83), recompile and install.
content.html:
I can reproduce it. Probably introduced in pull request #577.

As a workarounds while the fix is ready:

  1. Launch gazebo several times (depending on your network bandwidth) should end up with a full database ready.
  2. Modify sources, remove the timeout clause introduced in the while at ConnectionManager.cc, recompile and install.
